name: A Frog's Tale
description:
A short platformer in the style of a children's storybook about a frog named Alexander trying to find his friend, Ladybug.

As a children's story, the listener might fall asleep before you reach the end - but like any story, you can pick it up and start it again with the knowledge (and items!) you've already gained.

Made for the May 2022 Minijam. My first game jam submission!

All code, music, and art by me - excepting public domain paper textures, and sound effects from www.zapslat.com
